name: translate
description: Translate text to different languages on node.js and the browser
author: Francisco Presencia <public@francisco.io> (https://francisco.io/)

scripts.build: rollup src/index.js --name translate --output.format esm | terser --compress --mangle -o index.min.js
scripts.size: gzip -c index.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "npm run build && npm test && npm run gzip" --watch src --watch test --watch webpack.config.js --watch package.json
